title: Cultured.Code.Things.v2.2.5.MacOSX.Incl.Keymaker-CORE
description:
Things is a delightful and easy to use task manager. Featured as Editor's Choice in more than 150 countries

It's the perfect companion for everything you want to achieve in life, offering a great balance between ease of use and powerful features.

"Things is a true standout thanks to a great set of features and an interface that makes it a good fit for nearly any level of task management: It's simple enough to use for the most-basic to-do lists ... but it's powerful enough to handle a full blown GTD workflow... Things offers a unique combination of ease of use, a great interface, and flexibility that sets it apart from other to-do managers I've used." Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Dan Frakes, Macworld, Ã¢Ëœâ€¦Ã¢Ëœâ€¦Ã¢Ëœâ€¦Ã¢Ëœâ€¦Ã‚Â½

AWARDS

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Apple Design Award - Winner 
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Macworld Best of Show Award - Winner 
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Macworld Editor's Choice "Eddy" Award - Winner 
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Featured by Apple in "Get Stuff Done - Apps for Productive People"
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Featured by Apple in "Better Together - Apps to Connect Mac, iPhone & iPad"


FEATURES

When you start using Things, you'll be surprised how easy it is to enter and manage your tasks. And with Things' beautiful interface, task management becomes a delight. But all of this doesn't come at the expense of power Ã¢â‚¬â€œ everything you wish for in a task manager, Things has you covered.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Today: Decide which tasks you want to do today and put them into your Today list. Throughout the day, come back to this list to check items off. Things will automatically show you due and scheduled items there once their date arrives -- so you won't miss anything important.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Focus: See what you need to do Today, what's coming up Next, and what's Scheduled for later. Put tasks in Someday if you can't work on them right now, you can always come back to them later.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Keep organized: Work, Family, Hobby - with Things, everything has its place. Projects and Areas of Responsibility let you master complex tasks and stay on top of your responsibilities in life and work.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use Tags to assign contexts, priorities, time Ã¢â‚¬â€œ whatever fits your personal workflow. Quickly filter a list to find those tasks which are most relevant now.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Out of your head, into Things: Enter new ideas the moment they hit you. Things' Quick Entry window lets you add new tasks without interrupting your work. And thanks to the amazing Autofill feature, the Quick Entry window can be automatically pre-filled with the currently selected text, along with a link to the email you are reading, the webpage you are currently viewing, or the document you are editing (works with most applications).

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ And much more: Create repeating tasks, add due dates, schedule tasks for a later date, import & export Reminders, review completed tasks in the Logbook, etc.


THINGS CLOUD

Your to-dos, on all your devices. Things Cloud stores your to-dos and updates them quickly & effortlessly across your Macs, iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad (iOS apps sold separately). And best of all, Things Cloud is free.


Visit our web site for more information and to download a trial version of Things.

"Of course, everyone has specific needs and preferences that will steer them toward a particular to-do-list program or another. But ThingsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ combination of ease of use, great interface, and flexibility make it as close to the ideal Mac to-do app as weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve seen." Ã¢â‚¬â€ Macworld

Whats New in Version 2.0.1
Things 2.0.1:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improved stability and bug fixes.
Things 2 is a free update for all existing customers. 
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Introducing Things Cloud. Your to-dos on all your devices. 
Never worry about syncing again. Things Cloud stores your to-dos and automatically keeps them updated on your Mac, iPad, iPhone, and iPod touch (iOS apps sold separately). Simply turn on Things Cloud in Preferences. 

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ The all-new Daily Review helps you stay on top of your day. 
All to-dos that need your attention are presented to you on top of your Today list, such as to-dos that are due or scheduled for today. Easily review them and make a decision. Pick the ones to start today and postpone the rest until later. 

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ And much more: 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Compatibility for OS X Mountain Lion. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ A re-engineered core for a blazingly fast Things Cloud performance. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Retina graphics for the new MacBook Pro. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Full-Screen mode. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Reduced window chrome and monochrome toolbar buttons. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Visual refinements for the Tags & Quick Entry windows. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Redesigned Reminders integration to make import & export simpler. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The app is now Sandboxed for OS X security. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Many other improvements. 

Please note: 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Things Cloud replaces the old Bonjour WiFi Sync. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ This update requires OS X 10.6.6 or later. 

If you have any questions, please contact support through our website. 

Thank you for using Things!

What's New in Version 2.1
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Re-designed Reminders integration on Mountain Lion.
- New preference pane for "Reminders & Siri" integration. It covers the most common use case of using Siri on iOS devices to enter new to-dos.
- Added option to hide reminders with location-based alarms.
- Added option to hide reminders with time-based alarms.
- Removed option to export Today's to-dos, since Mountain Lion doesn't show reminders next to your Calendar events anymore.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improved stability and bug fixes.

What's New in Version 2.2
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ More robust handling of dates when traveling between time zones.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Major performance improvements across the app.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Downloading to-dos from Things Cloud is now even faster.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Additional bug fixes and improvements.

Version 2.2.1:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixed an issue where future dates weren't calculated properly in the repeating task creation dialog.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixed an issue where due dates of items in Today were rolled back by one day if the export to iCal feature was enabled.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixed an issue where OS X locale settings were not being respected by date pickers on OS X 10.6 and 10.7.5.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Updated a troubleshooting link to point at a new support page.

Whats new:
Compatibility for OS X 10.9 Mavericks.
Improved stability and bug fixes.

Whats new:
Fixed a bug with Daylight Savings Time which can cause weekly repeating tasks to show in Daily Review a day early.
Fixed a bug where repeating tasks created on the Mac would show up on iOS with an end date of Dec 31, 4000.

What's New in Version 2.2.4
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improved stability and bug fixes.

Whats new:
Improved how database files are handled and backed up on OS X 10.9 Mavericks.
